Age.description: The age of the insurance buyer

Employment Type.description: The employment type of the insurance buyer, either Government Sector or Private Sector/Self Employed

value_dict.Government Sector: The insurance buyer is employed in the government sector
value_dict.Private Sector/Self Employed: The insurance buyer is employed in the private sector or is self-employed

GraduateOrNot.description: Whether the insurance buyer is a graduate or not

value_dict.Yes: The insurance buyer is a graduate
value_dict.No: The insurance buyer is not a graduate

AnnualIncome.description: The annual income of the insurance buyer

FamilyMembers.description: The number of family members of the insurance buyer

ChronicDiseases.description: Whether the insurance buyer has chronic diseases or not

value_dict.1: The insurance buyer has chronic diseases
value_dict.0: The insurance buyer does not have chronic diseases

FrequentFlyer.description: Whether the insurance buyer is a frequent flyer or not

value_dict.No: The insurance buyer is not a frequent flyer
value_dict.Yes: The insurance buyer is a frequent flyer

EverTravelledAbroad.description: Whether the insurance buyer has ever travelled abroad or not

value_dict.No: The insurance buyer has never travelled abroad
value_dict.Yes: The insurance buyer has travelled abroad

TravelInsurance.description: Whether the insurance buyer has travel insurance or not

value_dict.0: The insurance buyer does not have travel insurance
value_dict.1: The insurance buyer has travel insurance

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in insurance prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the insurance buyer, please predict if the buyer has travel insurance.
prompt.answer_prompt: Has travel insurance[1] or does not have travel insurance[0]?

class_value_dict.0: The insurance buyer does not have travel insurance
class_value_dict.1: The insurance buyer has travel insurance

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in health prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the insurance buyer, please predict if the buyer has chronic diseases.
prompt.answer_prompt: Has chronic diseases[1] or does not have chronic diseases[0]?

class_value_dict.0: The insurance buyer does not have chronic diseases
class_value_dict.1: The insurance buyer has chronic diseases

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in travel behavior prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the insurance buyer, please predict if the buyer is a frequent flyer.
prompt.answer_prompt: Is a frequent flyer[1] or is not a frequent flyer[0]?

class_value_dict.No: The insurance buyer is not a frequent flyer
class_value_dict.Yes: The insurance buyer is a frequent flyer
